1.name: Peyton Place
1.description: A peaceful New England town hides secrets and scandals.

2.name: 12 Angry Men
2.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

3.name: Paths of Glory
3.description: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

4.name: Gunfight at the O.K. Corral
4.description: Lawman Wyatt Earp and outlaw Doc Holliday form an unlikely alliance which culminates in their participation in the legendary Gunfight at the O.K. Corral.

5.name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
5.description: British POWs build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, oblivious of the Allies' plans to destroy it.

6.name: Det sjunde inseglet
6.description: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

7.name: Raintree County
7.description: A student falls in love with a Southern belle, but their relationship is complicated by her troubled past and the onset of the Civil War.

8.name: Witness for the Prosecution
8.description: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

9.name: Funny Face
9.description: An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.

10.name: Old Yeller
10.description: A teenage boy grows to love a stray yellow dog while helping his mother and younger brother run their Texas homestead while their father is away on a cattle drive. First thought to be good-for-nothing mutt, Old Yeller is soon beloved by all.

11.name: Smultronstället
11.description: After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

12.name: An Affair to Remember
12.description: A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?

13.name: Seven Thunders
13.description: Escaping British prisoners of war hide out in German occupied France.

14.name: Kumonosu-jô
14.description: A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.

15.name: Run of the Arrow
15.description: When the South loses the war, Confederate veteran O'Meara goes West, joins the Sioux, takes a wife and refuses to be an American but he must choose a side when the Sioux go to war against the U.S. Army.

16.name: The Prince and the Showgirl
16.description: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.

17.name: Sweet Smell of Success
17.description: Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.

18.name: 3:10 to Yuma
18.description: Broke small-time rancher Dan Evans is hired by the stagecoach line to put big-time captured outlaw leader Ben Wade on the 3:10 train to Yuma but Wade's gang tries to free him.

19.name: The Tin Star
19.description: A cynical former sheriff turned bounty hunter helps a young, recently appointed acting sheriff with his advice, his experience and his gun.

20.name: Le notti di Cabiria
20.description: A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.

21.name: Sayonara
21.description: A US Air Force major in Kobe confronts his own opposition to marriages between American servicemen and Japanese women when he falls for a beautiful performer.

22.name: A Face in the Crowd
22.description: An Arkansas drifter becomes an overnight media sensation. As he becomes drunk with fame and power, will he ever be exposed as the fraud he has become?

23.name: The Three Faces of Eve
23.description: A doctor treats a woman suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder.

24.name: Night of the Demon
24.description: American professor John Holden arrives in London for a parapsychology conference, only to find himself investigating the mysterious actions of Devil-worshiper Julian Karswell.

25.name: Love in the Afternoon
25.description: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

26.name: The Incredible Shrinking Man
26.description: When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.

27.name: The Curse of Frankenstein
27.description: Victor Frankenstein builds a creature and brings it to life, but it behaves not as he intended.

28.name: Edge of the City
28.description: Two New York City longshoremen Axel Nordmann, an Army deserter and Tommy Tyler, an easy-going freight car loader whose growing friendship is threatened by Charles Malik, a notably repellent punk.

29.name: Legend of the Lost
29.description: American ne'er-do-well Joe January is hired to take Paul Bonnard on an expedition into the desert in search of treasure.

30.name: Pal Joey
30.description: Joey Evans' a charming, handsome, funny, talented a-1st class, A-N°.1 - heel. When Joey meets the former chorus girl and now is the rich widow, Vera Simpson, the pair of lecherous souls seem made for each other.

31.name: Tammy and the Bachelor
31.description: An unsophisticated young woman from the Mississippi swamps falls in love with an unconventional southern gentleman.

32.name: The Enemy Below
32.description: During World War II, an American destroyer meets a German U-Boat. Both captains are experts, and so begins a deadly game of cat-and-mouse.

33.name: A King in New York
33.description: A recently-deposed European monarch seeks shelter in New York City, where he becomes an accidental television celebrity and is later wrongly accused of being a Communist.

34.name: I Was a Teenage Werewolf
34.description: A hypnotherapist uses a temperamental teenager as guinea pig for a serum which transforms him into a vicious werewolf.

35.name: The Wayward Bus
35.description: Three strangers, a stripper, an alcoholic wife and a travelling salesman embark on a life-changing journey. As the road presents challenges, each character faces his or her own shortcomings, not knowing where life will lead next.

36.name: The Traitor
36.description: Survivors of the World War 2 German Resistance Group attend an annual reunion at an English country house. The reunion is hosted by Colonel Price, who intends to find out which guest had betrayed their leader.

37.name: Letyat zhuravli
37.description: Veronica plans a rendezvous with her lover, Boris, at the bank of river, only for him to be drafted into World War II shortly thereafter.

38.name: The Strange One
38.description: Jocko De Paris, cadet leader in a Southern military academy, so manipulates events that George Avery, Jr., son of the school's executive officer, is found drunk and expelled. Through ...                See full summary »

39.name: Hell Drivers
39.description: Ex-con trucker tries to expose his boss' rackets.

40.name: Le notti bianche
40.description: A humble clerk courts a woman who night after night awaits for the return of her lover.

41.name: 20 Million Miles to Earth
41.description: The first U.S. spaceship to Venus crash-lands off the coast of Sicily on its return trip. A dangerous, lizard-like creature comes with it and quickly grows gigantic.

42.name: Men in War
42.description: During the Korean War, a battle-worn lieutenant and his platoon are behind enemy lines, and have orders to march to Hill 465 for possible relief.

43.name: Jailhouse Rock
43.description: After serving time for manslaughter, young Vince Everett becomes a teenage rock star.

44.name: Attack of the Crab Monsters
44.description: Scientists become trapped on a shrinking island with intelligent, murderous giant crabs.

45.name: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
45.description: During World War II, an American marine and an Irish nun form an unlikely friendship after being stranded on a South Pacific island. They find comfort in one another as the two hope for a rescue.

46.name: Fortune Is a Woman
46.description: An insurance investigator runs into an ex-girlfriend, who is still as beautiful as he remembered her, but is now married. He soon finds himself involved in arson, blackmail, and murder.

47.name: The Bachelor Party
47.description: Five office friends meet up for a night on the town to celebrate the forthcoming marriage of one of them. As the night wears on and the drink starts to tell, they become more confidential ...                See full summary »

48.name: Island in the Sun
48.description: Set during the 1950s on a British-ruled Caribbean island, this drama deals with local politics, interracial relationships, social inequality, racism, adultery, and murder.

49.name: The Monster That Challenged the World

50.name: Loving You
50.description: A musician and a publicist help a delivery man achieve stardom.
